hero.title: Spreading the Light of Christ in Azerbaijan
hero.description: Grace Church is dedicated to proclaiming the Gospel of Jesus Christ’s "Finished Work" and sharing the message of God’s grace throughout Baku and across the regions of Azerbaijan.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: To share the gospel, disciple believers, and plant churches across Azerbaijan, trusting God's Word to transform lives.
mission.shareGospelDescription: We distribute Bibles and build relationships to share the love of Christ with the people of Azerbaijan.
mission.discipleBelieversDescription: We nurture new believers through Bible studies and prayer, helping them grow in their faith journey.
mission.plantChurchesDescription: We establish new churches in unreached areas like Baku, Lankaran, and Barda, bringing hope to communities.

services.title: Service Times
services.subtitle: Services are held twice a week

sermons.title: Recent Sermons
sermons.subtitle: Listen to inspiring messages that will strengthen your faith and encourage your walk with God.
sermons.walkingInFaithDescription: Exploring what it means to trust God in uncertain times.
sermons.powerOfPrayerDescription: Understanding how prayer transforms our hearts and circumstances.
sermons.loveInActionDescription: How to demonstrate God's love through our daily actions.

testimonials.title: Lives Transformed
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from members of our church family about their experiences and how God is working in their lives.
testimonials.rustamContent: I was healed from a torn coronary artery despite no hope from doctors. Moved by this miracle, I accepted Christ, and my whole family followed. God's power is real!
testimonials.rovshanContent: After accepting Christ, my father heard about Christianity and said, "Introduce me to Jesus." He was eager to learn more about this faith that changed my life.
testimonials.ilkinContent: I received a Bible and meet with the church often, asking many questions about faith. Sometimes I say, "I hope I'm not bothering you with all my questions," but my curiosity is drawing me closer to Christ.

needs.title: Join Us in Prayer and Support
needs.subtitle: Your partnership is vital to our mission. Here are some of the key areas where you can make a difference.
needs.buildingDescription: We currently rent a space and often face requests to leave. A permanent building would provide stability for worship, Bible studies, and youth and children’s ministries.
needs.protectionDescription: New believers often face persecution. Your prayers and support can help provide a safe and encouraging environment for them to grow in their faith.
needs.resourcesDescription: We need resources to distribute more Bibles, train leaders, and support our missionary work across the country.
